Articles.Content:
So many craft, so many Kerbal years! I signed up last year but never posted, always meant to. Now that 1.0 is out, I figured I could spare a minute to say good-bye to Beta! What better way than this postcard from the Mun?

Greggun, Meldin, Chadcal, & Kelry checking in from Highlands Base, Mun.

![solongpointnineoh.jpg](http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i427/69bluebird/solongpointnineoh.jpg)

P.S.: Thanks Squad!
Welcome aboard! Wow, that's a great looking base you have there!

hmmm, interesting design! The Hitchikers connected with fuel tanks, right?

It looks veryy good.

edit: Is it for a one-way trip? or can you return with it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T20:42:36Z" title="05/04/2015 08:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by AletzN1**

> 
> hmmm, interesting design! The Hitchikers connected with fuel tanks, right?
> It looks veryy good.
> 
> edit: Is it for a one-way trip? or can you return with it?

Thanks! The clipping magic you see is a Rockomax adapter... The base was not designed to be mobile.
